name: A Mars Adventure: Redturtle
description: Redturtle brings the photo-real look of the Planet Mars and the full control of the Mars Rover to the users. Users can explore the planet's surface and experience how the real-life Mars Rover missions took place and felt.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel i5 - 2.80 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 Storage: 4500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel i5 - 2.80 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 Storage: 4500 MB available space
